channel.title: worklife on MEC Germany
channel.description: Recent content in worklife on MEC Germany

item.title: Working in Germany: Project Engineer at Deiring GmbH
item.description: 12 July 2019 marked my last day at Deiring GmbH as a project engineer. Deiring GmbH is a small size company in Wertheim, Germany. It main business is automation project. Having served this company for just a little over 9 months allows me to experience project engineer life and understand deeply a good project engineer personal traits. As the name suggest, project engineer execute project to meet customer requirements. Simply to say it is the kind of engineer that make sure the project is done.
